column4: Hey guys! I'm trying to install Ubuntu, and I need a bit of help.
See, the problem is with the xserver thing. I haven't actually made it into Gnome yet, it keeps saying that I have "no screen" in my xorg.conf file. Did something get set up wrongly?
run sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg in terminal
I tried that. I even didn't add the actual resolution that I want to run at. It still didn't help.
